level.heading: PAYMENT OF PRIZES TO PERSONS UNDER EIGHTEEN YEARS OF AGE (ยง 30-608)

level.text: If a person entitled to a prize is under the age of eighteen (18), the Executive Director shall direct payment pursuant to D.C. Official Code ยง3-1315.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2211 (May 28, 1982).
